description: There are a number of outputs available for TRS files including Alpine Output No Inker which creates a standard Alpine TRS output file without Inker formatting, Standard (Not Compressed) which creates an Alpine TRS output file formatted for an Inker printer without compression of cutting information, Compressed which creates an Alpine TRS output file formatted for an Inker printer with Compression of cutting information and Compressed with batch label which creates an Alpine TRS output file formatted for an Inker printer with compression of cutting information.
